abstract: Prosecution rests in trial of former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez for 2013 murder of Odin Lloyd.
lead_paragraph: The prosecution rested in the murder trial of the former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez.

headline.main: Prosecution Rests in Hernandez Murder Trial
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Football; Prosecution Rests at Hernandez Trial

snippet: The prosecution rested in the murder trial of the former New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez.
